note:
Maker of things interactive. Multimedia, musea, moving images, maps & miscellany. Archivist by nature and by proxy. Reformed cinephile. Weaving the web since before the first browser war. Raised on 8 bits and tinkering ever since.

Too much old tech, too many plants; nurturer of both.

Still stares at the sky in wonder.

Ally.
(((he/him)))
